channel.title: So what games did you buy in the Steam (and other) Christmas sales?
channel.description:
In previous years, I've gone on oblivious to the awesome deals on offer every Christmas (and other holiday times) on Steam (and other digital distribution services), but not any longer! Even though I'm currently on holiday, I braved the dodgy Chinese internet I'm using to cash in on some of the deals.
So far I've bought Batman: Arkham Asylum, the first three Splinter Cell games and two Monkey Island games for about $20. I'm planning to pick up Torchlight and The Adventures of P.B. Winterbottom, currently $5 and $0.50 respectively, before the end of the sales. I'm also hoping that Bad Company 2 re-emerges by the end of the period, because its not available for sale in China :frowning: .
Given that there are [i]so[/i] many awesome deals going around, what has everyone else picked up? Or is hoping to pick up?

item.title: So what games did you buy in the Steam (and other) Christmas sales?
item.dc:creator: Cypher
item.description:
Right… so in my somewhat addicted trance of “might as well by as many games as I can, given the prices”, I went all out this year to try to fill my ongoing back catalogue of games I should own or want to try:
Starwars Battlefront II
Lucasarts Jedi Knight Bundle
Supreme Commander 2
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. CoP + SoC
Hitman Collection
Brothers in Arms Pack
Serious Sam Gold Pack (ROW)
Mirror’s Edge
FlatOut Ultimate Carnage (ROW)
FlatOut2
FlatOut
The Witcher: Enhanced Edition (ROW)
Battlefield Bad Company 2 Standard Edition
Battlefield Bad Company 2 Specact DLC
Battlefield Bad Company 2 Vietnam
OddBoxx
Killing Floor PostMortem Character Pack 2 DLC
Killing Floor - “London’s Finest” DLC Character pack
Infernal
The Deus Ex Collection
Super Meat Boy

I was also gifted these two games by a friend on Steam as they were in my wishlist:
Red Faction Guerrilla
Deathspank TOV

Read full topic

item.title: So what games did you buy in the Steam (and other) Christmas sales?
item.dc:creator: loony636
item.description:
Maxey:

BC2 was on sale twice, bro.

I know, but I was in China both times. Where you can’t buy it. So I was hoping that it would come back for the last day, but no dice.

item.dc:creator: loony636
item.description:
Last day of sales and no BFBC2. Sadness reigns.

On the massive up side, I managed to get my girlfriend hooked on Broken Sword. And two of the games even run on her Mac. Its shit like this Steam. Shit like this.

item.title: So what games did you buy in the Steam (and other) Christmas sales?
item.dc:creator: Hellblazer-14
item.description:
I heard a lot of good about Spore, but the truth is slightly different, poor poor graphics, boring repetitive gameplay (one playthrough and it’s over, and it doesn’t take long)
The Ideas are all really awesome, but they didn’t get the game right :’( But enough about that, I’m sure many people found it to be very good ^^
I really want Mafia II, but my damned Paypal account has run out of money.

Edit : I would def. recommend the stalker bundle, the whole series was incredible, and you’ll get many hours of gameplay out of it.

Read full topic
item.source: So what games did you buy in the Steam (and other) Christmas sales?

item.title: So what games did you buy in the Steam (and other) Christmas sales?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Freeman
item.description:
The Deus Ex Collection
Super Meat Boy
Amnesia: The Dark Descent
Half-Life: Blue Shift
Half-Life: Opposing Force

I’m a poor bastard so I only bought stuff if it was 5 bucks or less. Speaking of that, what would someone suggest I buy out of the following (I can only get one): Killing Floor, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Bundle, or Plants vs. Zombies? I’m leaning toward the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Bundle, just because that’s technically the best savings overall.

EDIT: Wait, what the hell. I could’ve sworn the Killing Floor Bundle was $4.99 earlier… now that’s standalone version.

Read full topic

item.title: So what games did you buy in the Steam (and other) Christmas sales?
item.dc:creator: Hellblazer-14
item.description:
Sometimes I’m not sure if I should love or hate steam for the christmas deals, I think I spent all my christmas cash on the many great games on offer…

  • Assassin’s Creed 2
  • Just Cause 2
  • Tropico 3 Absolute Power + Steam Special Edition
  • Spore Complete Edition
  • Wings of Prey
  • Singularity
  • Left 4 Dead 2
  • Dead Space
  • Dragon Age : origins Ultimate Edition

:fffuuu:

Read full topic
